Busy night... but there's always room for another! What is your name adventurer?

Guess the name of the mystery card!

  1. Choose difficulty level:
    • Easy: Only the name of the card is hidden.
    • Medium: The name of the card is hidden as well as one of these three things: attack, health and mana cost.
    • Hard: Same as above but the card art is hidden.
  2. Type the name of the card into the input box. If the name is correct, you will be awarded points. The amount is based on how fast you guessed the name of the card!
  3. If you are stuck, you can press the skip button to go to the next card. You won't be awarded any points for skipping a card!
